GET /api.description: Serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api.

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics.

topics.description: The man, the Mitch, the legend

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles. Articles can be sorted by any property, ordered in ascending or descending order and filtered by topic.

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves a single article matching the given article_id.

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Accepts a request body in the form { inc_votes: 10 } and increases or decreases the votes for an article by the given amount and returns the updated article.

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET api/users.description: Serves an array of all users.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of all comments for the given article.

POST: /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a new comment to the matching article and returns the newly added comment.
